input.sentences: the family took a trip to the zoo .
the first think they did was give the boy a ride on a camel .
after that | they got to see the flamingos .
they also got to see a bear .
the habitat showed several bears interacting together .
output.sentences: My family went for a zoo trip.
The boy rides on a camel ride.
We saw a lot of flamingos over there.
The bear was roaming around there.
The bears are interacting with their habitat.
